overview: With more than fifteen years of IT, telecommunications and management experience, Mr. Todd Wallace brings a proven track record of delivering top-quality solutions that reflect growing marketplace demands. As Chief Operating Officer, Mr. Wallace oversees the network’s architecture and optimization, refining customer service and operational efficiency, and ensuring the security and reliability Pac-West’s customers have come to expect. Previously, Mr. Wallace held the Chief Technology Officer position Transcomm Enhanced Services, as well as Sourcecomm, Halo Wireless, Lonestar Corporate Services, VodaCode, Y-Tel International, Touchstone Systems and IPOperations.
